name: @icure/api
description: Typescript version of iCure standalone API client

scripts.gen: java -classpath swagger-codegen-generators.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -i https://kraken.svc.icure.cloud/v3/api-docs -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=Icc skipPathPrefix=/rest/v1 -o ./icc-api/
scripts.genloc: java -classpath swagger-codegen-generators.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -i http://127.0.0.1:16043/v3/api-docs -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=Icc skipPathPrefix=/rest/v1 -o ./icc-api/
scripts.gendev: java -classpath swagger-codegen-generators.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -i https://kraken.icure.dev/v3/api-docs -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=Icc skipPathPrefix=/rest/v1 -o ./icc-api/
scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && npm run build && jq '{name:.name, version:.version, description:.description, main:.main, types:.types, dependencies:.dependencies, author:.author, license:.license, bugs:.bugs, homepage:.homepage}' < package.json > dist/package.json
scripts.publish: yarn run prepare && cd dist && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version && cd ..

author: Taktik sa - B12 Consulting
